title: Original Art on Ebay!
author: verias
text:
That's right, I've a handful of pages up on ebay for auction. Each page is signed and numbered from chapter 1. Take a peek and see if you'd like to gift yourself with one for Consumas.

http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=330507371937&ssPageName=STRK:MESELX:IT#ht_500wt_1156

Keith W.

replies.author: verias
replies.text: Such an extreme response seems foreboding.
